verses.name: Isaiah 1:18
verses.text: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the Lord: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.

verses.name: Isaiah 1:19
verses.text: If ye be willing and obedient, ye shall eat the good of the land:

verses.name: Isaiah 1:20
verses.text: But if ye refuse and rebel, ye shall be devoured with the sword: for the mouth of the Lord hath spoken it.

verses.name: Isaiah 1:21
verses.text: How is the faithful city become an harlot! it was full of judgment; righteousness lodged in it; but now murderers.

verses.name: Isaiah 1:22
verses.text: Thy silver is become dross, thy wine mixed with water:
